unnormalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch with those tuition fees? Don't worry, there's good news! Scholarship portals are becoming seriously popular, like hot biryani at a college fest!
normalised: Hey students, feeling the pinch with those tuition fees? Do not worry, there is good news! Scholarship portals are becoming seriously popular, like hot biryani at a college fest!

unnormalised: These online platforms are basically treasure troves for funding opportunities, helping students from Kerala to Kashmir find the right scholarship. Think of them as Tinder, but for academic funding!
normalised: These online platforms are basically treasure troves for funding opportunities, helping students from Kerala to Kashmir find the right scholarship. Think of them as Tinder, but for academic funding!

unnormalised: Websites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are leading the charge, listing everything from merit-based scholarships to those targeting specific communities. You could find scholarships for engineering at IIT Delhi or even for learning Kathak!
normalised: Websites like Buddy4Study and Vidya Lakshmi are leading the charge, listing everything from merit based scholarships to those targeting specific communities. You could find scholarships for engineering at I I T Delhi or even for learning Kathak!

unnormalised: Applying is usually pretty straightforward – register, fill out your details, and upload the necessary documents. It's way easier than explaining to your parents why you need *another* data science course!
normalised: Applying is usually pretty straightforward - register, fill out your details, and upload the necessary documents. It is way easier than explaining to your parents why you need another data science course!

unnormalised: So, ditch the chai breaks for a few minutes and explore these scholarship portals. You might just find the financial boost you need.
normalised: So, ditch the chai breaks for a few minutes and explore these scholarship portals. You might just find the financial boost you need.

unnormalised: Remember, deadlines are real, folks! Keep an eye out for closing dates, especially with Onam festivities coming up – you don't want to miss out. Who knows, you might just snag that scholarship worth Rs. 50,000! Happy hunting!
normalised: Remember, deadlines are real, folks! Keep an eye out for closing dates, especially with Onam festivities coming up - you do not want to miss out. Who knows, you might just snag that scholarship worth rupees fifty thousand! Happy hunting!
